hero.title: The Best experience of music in 2023
hero.description: Get ready to rock out at the biggest music festival of the year! With an incredible lineup of top artists and an amazing atmosphere, this festival is the place to be for music lovers everywhere.

categoriesList.title: Pop
categoriesList.description: Popular music that emphasizes catchy melodies, danceable rhythms, and relatable lyrics.

categoriesList.title: Folk
categoriesList.description: Traditional music that originated in local and rural communities, often passed down orally from generation to generation.

categoriesList.title: Instrumental
categoriesList.description: Music that is composed or performed without vocals or lyrics.

categoriesList.title: Rock
categoriesList.description: Popular music characterized by the use of electric guitars, bass, and drums, and often accompanied by vocals.

categoriesList.title: Jazz
categoriesList.description: Music characterized by improvisation, syncopated rhythms, and a wide variety of musical instruments, including trumpet, saxophone, piano, bass, and drums.
